ai_sprite.name: alma
ai_sprite.dialog: I gave up the judgment seat so that I can focus my efforts to teaching this people and bringing them to repentance. Nephihah has been chosen by the people as the new chief judge. I'm sorry I can't accompany you into battle anymore. Please see what Nephihah has to say.

dialog.text: Don't think that the execution of Nehor will go unnoticed. His followers have already assembled under the leadership of Amlici. We will gain the voice of the people to anoint him as king and do away with the judges. But Moroni, I am not as patient as Amlici. I will avenge Nehor here and now!
